tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spare_parts_and_equipment (
  part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  part_category VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE parts (
  part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_name VARCHAR(255),
  part_number VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE wind_farms (
  farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_purchase DATE
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbines (
    turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    turbine_model VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    production_capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)
